title: Hello! I am <highlight>Younes</highlight>,a creative front end developer
about:
Passionate about creating modern and high-performing web interfaces, I recently earned the equivalent of a Bachelor's degree (Bac+3/4) in Web Developer through OpenClassRooms (2025), after completing a Bac+2 in Web Development (2022).

My journey has been shaped by diverse experiences that have allowed me to develop transferable skills such as adaptability, project management, and a strong capacity for learning. Today, I am fully dedicated to front-end development, with expertise in React and a constant desire to learn and take on new challenges.

argentBank.description: A modern banking application to manage your online accounts.

calculatrice.description: A simple calculator to perform math operations.

sportsee.description: A dashboard to track your sports activities.

fishEye.description: An immersive photo gallery developed in JavaScript.

lesPetitsPlats.description: A fast and efficient recipe search application.
